name: Fighting Survice:Wild Island
description:
Fighting Survice:Wild Island is an uninhabited wilderness. You lack of food and water, have to try your best to survive. Finally escape from the wild island and return to the civilized world. While you stay, you must learn the rules of survival, use your courage and wisdom to conquer the nature.
Features:
- Wilderness survival simulator 3D;
- Real beautiful nature;
- A lot of activities to do - craft weapon;
- Cool graphics and easy navigation.
- Explore the wilderness!
